verses.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. I will praise the LORD with my whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and in the congregation.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD! I will thank the LORD with everything in me, among the gathering of those who live right, in the whole community.

verses.kjv: The works of the LORD are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.
verses.ct: What the LORD has done is magnificent, studied by everyone who delights in them.

verses.kjv: His work is honourable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Everything he does is full of honor and splendor, and his righteousness lasts forever.

verses.kjv: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the LORD is gracious and full of compassion.
verses.ct: He has ensured that his amazing acts will never be forgotten. The LORD is generous and full of compassion.

verses.kjv: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.
verses.ct: He has provided food for those who are wholeheartedly dedicated to him. He will always remember his covenant.

verses.kjv: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.
verses.ct: He demonstrated the power of what he does to his people, giving them the lands that belonged to other nations.

verses.kjv: The works of his hands are verity and judgment; all his commandments are sure.
verses.ct: Everything his hands accomplish is trustworthy and just; all of his commands are reliable.

verses.kjv: They stand fast for ever and ever, and are done in truth and uprightness.
verses.ct: They remain firm for all time, carried out with truth and integrity.

verses.kjv: He sent redemption unto his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend is his name.
verses.ct: He brought redemption to his people and established his covenant forever. His name is holy and worthy of reverence.

verses.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Wholehearted dedication to the LORD is where wisdom begins. Everyone who follows his commands gains real understanding. His praise lasts forever.
